Name: The Dreamland：Free
About the game: About different versions of the game （The Dreamland：Free）and（The Dreamland ）：The biggest difference is that all the characters you saved in the Free version can be played in (The Dreamland), and more characters are looking forward to you Super many playable characters The future is promising, and more characters are looking forward to your experience~ [Introduction to the game] ------- You will play a hero who saves the village! Your task is to save all the creatures in this land! Bring them together and peace Lead them to rebuild their new homes! ------ Relevant play methods On the way to save them, you will encounter countless difficulties and dangers. You must keep learning and growing to strengthen yourself Fight: Learn powerful spells to protect yourself. Build a new home for the village name. Planting: In order to survive, you must plant various foods to supplement yourself Breeding: fishing, animal husbandry. and more --- Streamlight dream In the dream, you will enjoy the beauty of different dreams and experience the danger of not being able to dream ---- Note: Depending on the computer hardware, you may need to wait for 10s-120s when entering the game. Please wait quietly for the game to load
